task.title: Edit Report Outline
task.shortdesc: Make changes to the contents/order of the Report Outline.

step.cmd: To add a section to a report, click Add section/+ in Report Outline and select a section type from the list. Specify options for each section following instructions in .

stepresult.note: The sections available in the main report are different from those available for report subsections (Also see About Report Outline for details).

step.cmd: To remove a section from a report, select the section and click Remove section/- or press Delete/Backspace.
To reorder a section select it and use the up/down arrows.

stepresult.note: Subsections, such as Result List or Inventory, cannot be moved out of their section heading to a higher level in the report.
